Posts.Content: Your beast cancer treatment center is Sloan-Kettering, and I think there is one in New York.  They are on the East Coast.  AS for myself, a new comer of this whole cancer thing, I am set up at Carmono's (not sure of spelling) I just had surgery yesterday and not all the way back to reality.  However, both are best of the best.
Posts.Title: doctor/clinic in New York
